cast.name: 伊琳娜·帕特拉科娃 Irina Patrakova
米哈伊尔·奥尔洛夫 Mikhail Orlov

introduction: A fantastic story, the heroes of which find themselves in another space-time dimension.Despite the fact that the focus of the filmmakers is on devastated, lonely young people who have lost faith in everything, the film is not without fun adventures, funny scenes, love revelations and unexpected transformations in a mysterious space.Add. information: A completely forgotten and little-known science fiction film by Oleg Leshchiner, who doesn’t even have his own page on KinoPoisk.
